import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Nav from '../components/Nav' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import './CurrencyConverter.css' const url = 'https://blockchain.info/ticker' const CurrencyConverter = () => { const [currency, setCurrency] = useState([{}]) async function fetchTours() { const data = await fetch(url) const jsonData = await data.json() setCurrency(jsonData) console.log("Currency:") console.log(currency) console.log("jsonData:") console.log(jsonData) } useEffect(() => { fetchTours() }, []) return (
{/* {console.log(data)} */}

Convert any Value in any Currency to BTC

) } export default CurrencyConverter
